snippet.title: SphereKnight　-Official Trailer
snippet.description:
I released the English version of Sphere knight.

This application is a fresh and thrilling new type of action RPG where the hero roles into a ball to attack his enemies. 
Control is made by simple swipes, making use of a unique play style ideal for smartphones.
Intuitively roll the character to attack enemies as if you were rolling a real ball with your finger.

 android : http://goo.gl/eTXFFf
 ios : http://goo.gl/p24vYY

Twitter : https://twitter.com/@mugimeshi_001
